Hello,

Is there any way to share objects among the processors of a crawl job?
something like the web application scopes; ie. application scope (at
heritrix instance level), session scope (at crawl job level) and maybe
crawlUri level scope?

I actually need to split a processor which does too much stuff, in
several processors in several chains, but still share some things
among them like database connections, etc.
I can do this by a static field, but I would like to have affinity to
the job and not interfere with other heretrix instance.

Also I may need to attach on some CrawlURIs specific flags for the
other processors, I saw in the API the annotations, but I'm not sure
how to use them and how not to interfere with other things.

Thank you,
--
